name: Dream Tube
description:
Created for the Emulated Dreams jam.

A retro-styled experience drawing from actual dream journal entries and presented in a fashion reminiscent of LSD: Dream Emulator.

Controls: Mouse and keyboard (WASD + mouselook). Look and touch to explore further. See pause menu (Escape) for additional instructions and credits and to adjust display settings.

Note: Mac and Linux versions are universal builds (32 + 64 bit) and limited in testing, and therefore considered experimental.
